bug.author: flyyyyer
bug.description: In the "<denchmark-link:https://amass.is.tue.mpg.de/dataset>https://amass.is.tue.mpg.de/dataset</denchmark-link> ", there are only ”BMLrub“ and ”BMLmovi” dataset, how can I download ”BioMotionLab_NTroje“ dataset?

comments.comment:
In the "https://amass.is.tue.mpg.de/dataset", there are only ”BMLrub“ and ”BMLmovi” dataset, how can I download ”BioMotionLab_NTroje“ dataset?
When you download the BMLrub, you'll get .tar.bz2 file and after untar the file you'll get BioMotionLab_NTroje.
Thanks, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Liuxinyue521>@Liuxinyue521</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-link:https://github.com/flyyyyer>@flyyyyer</denchmark-link> should I mark this as closed?

Thanks, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Liuxinyue521>@Liuxinyue521</denchmark-link> . When I run the " python lib/data_utils/amass_utils.py --dir /data3/liwh/amass", I get another problem, could you help me? <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56632276/82023032-337def80-96c0-11ea-8ef5-00517f3a0c08.png></denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/flyyyyer>@flyyyyer</denchmark-link> , please pull the latest commits solving this issue. Check here <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mkocabas/VIBE/issues/76>#76</denchmark-link> .
